ComicInfo.Title: Chasing Shadows [Spirits of Venom Part 2]
ComicInfo.Series: Ghost Rider / Blaze: Spirits of Vengeance
ComicInfo.Summary: Chasing Shadows [Spirits of Venom Part 2]: Spider-Man and Father Martin, Blaze accidentally grazes Venom with his hellfire gun, almost killing him. Blaze, Ghost Rider and Venom go after Deathwatch's body when it is taken away by the Deathspawn. Ghost Rider has to stop Venom from killing Spider-Man. He tells Venom it's time to choose their enemies and they should rescue the innocents. However, when the deathspawn escape with Deathwatch's body Ghost Rider tries to rescue Deathwatch's body rather than help the defenseless people. John helps him to make the right decision and Venom, Ghost Rider and Blaze go to rescue the helpless humans.
